content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Inserter (position a) that puts iron ore into the first stone furnace
- Inserter (position b) that puts iron ore into the second stone furnace
- Inserter (position c) that puts coal into the first stone furnace
- Inserter (position d) that puts coal into the second stone furnace

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the target furnace is available and not busy before inserting items.
- Check that you have the required items in your inventory to insert into the furnaces.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have enough resources for your operations.
- Be mindful of the quantities of resources being extracted and inserted to avoid running out of essential materials.

### General Tips
- Always verify the positions of your entities to ensure they are correctly placed and connected.
- Maintain a clear overview of your structures to optimize the flow of resources.
